item.title: Pack Flow Control and Shutoff Valves – Normal Flow Mode

numlitem.para: Valve(s) is verified to close when the associated pack is selected OFF, and
For Passenger/Combi, lower lobe cargo A/C FLOW RATE (if installed) remains LO or OFF when associated pack is Pack 3.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Increase flight plan fuel by 0.3% for each pack operating in the HI Flow Mode.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to associated Pack selector "INOP - OFF". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: If Normal Flow Mode(s) is inoperative verify Pack Flow Control and Shutoff Valve(s) will close when the associated pack is Selected OFF by accomplishing the following procedures:
Position the associated Bleed Air Control panel (P5) PACK selector ON and verify that air flow to the pack is indicated on the synoptic display.
Position the associated Bleed Air Control panel (P5) PACK selector OFF and verify OFF is displayed for the associated pack on the synoptic display.
